casebody.data:
James P. Kernochan, Individually and as Executor, etc., et al., Respondents v. The New York Elevated Railroad Company, et al., Appellants. (Action No. 2.) Decided February 13, 1891. Appeal by defendants from order denying them leave to serve an amended and supplemental answer. Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. G. Willett Van Nest, for respondents.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Freedman, J.

Per Curiam.

Order appealed from affirmed, with $10 costs.
